authModal.title: Welcome to Joint Action for Sustainable Developement
authModal.subtitleOrganisation: To follow {{organisation}}, please login or register an account.
authModal.subtitleActivity: To save {{activity}}, please login or register an account.

confirmationModal.title: Are you sure?
confirmationModal.description: Do you want to perform this action? You cannot undo the action afterwards!

texts.wizard.period: Attention! Please only create actions within the action period
texts.wizard.about: Add the most important information about your event.
texts.wizard.description: Explain your event and describe how to participate.
texts.wizard.topics: Enter here more information and details about the location.

texts.addLoginModal: Please log in to add an event.

titles.noOrgaSubs: You have not followed any organisation
titles.noActivitySubs: You have not saved any events
titles.noOrganisation: You are not part of any organisation.
titles.orgaUserForm: People who can manage your organization:
titles.orgaUserList: People who are allowed to manage your organisation:
titles.noOffers: You do not have any offers, yet
titles.noBestPractices: You do not have any pratical examples, yet

texts.map: On the interactive map you can find organisations and events using advanced filter functions.
texts.myData: In your profile you have an overview of various functionalities. You can change your personal data, create or edit your organisation and its events and find followed organisations and saved events. You can change your password via the 'Forgotten password' function when you log in.
texts.danActivities: Here you can register, change, and delete your actions for the German Sustainability Action Days.
texts.myDataShort: Here you can change your name or delete your account.
texts.myOrga: Here you can customize your organisation profile and add people who can manage your organisation.
texts.noOrgaSubs: Simply search for organisations via the map and click on 'Follow organisation'.
texts.noActivitySubs: Simply search for events via the map and click on 'Save event'.
texts.orgaSubs: Discover organisations on the platform and follow them to keep track of your favourites. Click 'Follow organisation' on the map to add new organisations.
texts.activitySubs: Discover and save events on the platform to keep track of your favourites. Click 'Save event' on the map to add new events.
texts.noActivities: You can create an event by clicking the 'Create event' button.
texts.noDanActivities: You can create an action by clicking the 'Create action' button.
texts.activities: Here you can create events for your organisation. These will be displayed in the event calendar.
texts.leave: Do you really want to leave your organisation? After you have left, you need to be added again to be able to manage your organisation again.
texts.deleteOrga: Do you really want your organisation to be irrevocably deleted? With the deletion, all stored data of your organisation will be lost.
texts.deleteActivity: Should the event really be irrevocably deleted? With the deletion, all stored data of this event will be lost.
texts.deleteAction: Should the action really be irrevocably deleted? With the deletion, all stored data of this action will be lost.
texts.orgaInClearing: Your organisation is getting checked by us
texts.noOrganisation: You can only create events once you belong to an organisation.
texts.activityWips: The editing of these events has not yet been completed.
texts.finishedActivities: These events are already shown on the map.
texts.addUserHint: If no user with the specified email address exists on the platform, a new one will be created and notified.
texts.confirmDelteUser: Do your really want the person {{email}} to be removed as {{role}} from your organisation?
texts.welcome: Here your will find an overview of all important areas of the platform.You can create new entries here and edit or delete your data at any time.
texts.developer: Here your will find information for developers who want to connect to the Joint Action for Sustainable Development from their applications.
texts.offers: Here you can add offers to the search & share feature. This includes, for example, jobs, educational offers, funding programmes and grants.
texts.noOffers: You can create an offer simply by clicking the 'Create new offer' button.
texts.bestPractices: Here you can make your organisation's sustainability reporting, selected project reports or further practical examples available to others via the search & share feature.
texts.noBestPractices: You can create an practical example simply by clicking the 'Share a practical example' button.

notifications.success: in the future you will only receive technically necessary e-mails.
notifications.error: At the moment we cannot unsubscribe you from receiving emails. Please try again later.

notifications.lastAdmin: You are the last admin of your organisation and therefore cannot leave it.
notifications.userAdded: The user was added successfully to your organisation and has been notified.
notifications.notAllwedToJoinOrga: The user is already a member of an organisation or it's not allowed to add him/her to an organisation.

titles.noSearchResults: Unfortunately, we do not have any matches for your search.
titles.slider: Noch nicht gefunden, wonach du suchst? Schaue auch gerne bei unseren Partner:innen vorbei
titles.add: Does your organisation also want to share an offer or practical example?

texts.newOffer: Here you can create an offer for others. It doesn’t matter whether it is a job, volunteering or materials, there are no limits.
texts.step1Offer: Please choose a category. If none is suitable, select “Other”.  *
texts.step2Offer: Please choose a maximum of two subject areas.
texts.step3Offer: Give your offer a meaningful title and a short description. The more information you provide, the easier it is for other users to find your offer.
texts.step5Offer: Choose the contact person for this offer *
texts.step6Offer: Choose whether the offer should be above the other offers
texts.deleteOffer: Do your really want to delete the offer?
texts.newBestPractice: Here you can share a practical example from your organisation with others.
texts.step1BestPractice: Please choose a category. If none is suitable, select “Other” *
texts.step2BestPractice: Please choose a maximum of two subject areas.
texts.step3BestPractice: Give your practical example a meaningful title and add a short description as well as an URL link.
texts.step4BestPractice: Where is the practical example located? *
texts.step5BestPractice: Choose the contact person for this practical example *
texts.deleteBestPractice: Do your really want to delete the practical exmaple?
texts.addLoginModal: To be able to create an offer or practical example, your need an organization profile.

placeholders.description: Describe your offer and try to include all necessary information, e.g. relevant time period, requirements, other references...
placeholders.descriptionBestPractice: Describe your practical example and try to include all necessary information, e.g. relevant time period, requirements, other references...
placeholders.search: What are you looking for? E.g. volunteering

labels.imageHelp: JPG, .JPGE,.PNG. Maximum file size 1MB. Optimal size 616x216px.
labels.url: Here you can add an external link to your offer (optional).
labels.urlBestPractice: Here you can add an external link to your practical example (optional)
labels.imageError: An error occured (JPG, .JPGE,.PNG. Maximum file size 1MB)

notifications.createBestPracticeSuccess: Your practical example was successfully created.

texts.organisations: Here you have the possibility to view and edit all organistions of the platfrom.
texts.noOrgas: Sorry, no results can be found for your currently set filters.

clearing.adminWarning: ATTENTION! You are editing this organisation as ADMIN. All changes overwrite the previous status. To restart the duplicate check for clearing, your have to run the wizard completely.

texts.continue: You have successfully confirmed your e-mail address. Click on 'Continue' to proceed.
texts.orga: You are active in an organisation and want to inspire more people with your events? Then you can create your organisation here.

upload.error: An error occurred (Max. file size 1MB, permitted file types: jpg, png)
